title: Nice bright flat renting out in front of Humboldthain park for 2 Weeks
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Nice bright flat renting out in front of Humboldthain park for 2 Weeks

Ideally for one person or max a quiet couple, at the last floor of an “Altbau” the flat is renovated and full furnished. The apartment has one bedroom, a bathroom, a spacious kitchen as well a big living room with balcony.
When: 17th of September to 1st/ 3rd of October 2024
Distance by walk: 2' to Sbahn Humboldthain, 8' to Sbahn Wedding, 10’ to Gesundbrunnen and 15' to Mitte/Mauerpark.
🫰🏾Price: 500€ + caution
🚭NOT smoking inside

If you have any questions do not hesitate to contact me (also to visit it)

Thank you 
Have a lovely day
